sentences.en: A log fire crackled in the hearth.
sentences.cn: 炉中的木柴烧得噼啪作响。

sentences.en: A log fire roared in the open hearth.
sentences.cn: 柴火在敞开着的壁炉里熊熊燃烧。

sentences.en: a roaring log fire
sentences.cn: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

sentences.en: All phone calls are logged.
sentences.cn: 所有电话均予以记录。

sentences.en: Customers pay to log on and gossip with other users.
sentences.cn: 顾客付费后登录系统和其他用户聊天。

sentences.en: I reached for a floating log with my foot.
sentences.cn: 我用脚去钩取一段漂浮着的木头.

sentences.en: I set the log on the ground and shaved off the bark.
sentences.cn: 我将原木放到了地上，刨掉了树皮。

sentences.en: In the evening a log fire would provide cosiness.
sentences.cn: 晚上点起篝火会让人感到温暖舒适。

sentences.en: The captain always keeps a log.
sentences.cn: 船长坚持记航海日志。

sentences.en: The captain alwayskeeps a log.
sentences.cn: 船长坚持记航海日志。

sentences.en: The captain described the accident in the ship's log.
sentences.cn: 船长在航海日志中描述了这件事.

sentences.en: The large log basket can be used to tidy toys away.
sentences.cn: 大木篮子可以用来装玩具。

sentences.en: The log cabin stayed empty, except when we came.
sentences.cn: 除非我们到来，要不然那间小木屋一直都是空的。

sentences.en: The mat was smouldering where the burning log had fallen.
sentences.cn: 燃烧的木棒落下的地方垫子慢慢燃烧起来.

sentences.en: The most valuable find of all was the ship's log book.
sentences.cn: 在所发现的东西中,最珍贵的就是那艘船的日志.

sentences.en: the olde worlde atmosphere of the tea room with its log fire
sentences.cn: 壁炉中燃烧着木柴的茶室的古朴气氛

sentences.en: The password allows the user to log into the system.
sentences.cn: 用戶用密码可进入系统.

sentences.en: They log for a living.
sentences.cn: 他们以伐木为生。

sentences.en: This log will do duty for a table.
sentences.cn: 这段圆木可以用作桌子.

sentences.en: We sawed the log into planks.
sentences.cn: 我们把木头锯成了木板.

words.tran_cn: 把…锯成段木；砍伐树木（log的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: (as) easy as falling off a log

phrases.tran_cn: (木材)未经斧削的；处于原木状态的
象木头一样不动；无知觉的
航海日志；记录簿；值班日记
航海日志记录；值班日志记录

phrases.phrase: log in  或 log on &I{【计算机科学】}
phrases.tran_cn: 进入，注册，登录：往计算机内输入开始一个程序的信息

phrases.phrase: log out  或 log off &I{【计算机科学】}
phrases.tran_cn: 退出，注销：往计算机内输入结束一个程序的信息
n. 圣诞柴；圣诞节原木形大蛋糕

trans.tran_en: a thick piece of wood from a tree

trans.tran_cn: 伐木，把…载入正式记录，行驶
trans.tran_en: to make an official record of events, facts etc
to make an official record of events, facts etc
